I don't understand some people who think Sky is much better though. In what way? In the unexperienced commentators? Hill is ok, and M. Brundle and the other people that are from BBC, but everyone else is pretty much ***... I hate how they advertise their own stuff, how the filmed interviews and videos repeat both before qualification and race, how all the interviews seem forced, how they make drivers explain the race track etc. BBC was much more relaxed and, in my opinion, informative. Better commentary, better jokes, better everything. Want those BBC funny videos with F1 drivers back.

Sack her and have Anthony out in the pits talking to the drivers with Ted Kravitz ! OR just doing extra videos like Martin used too.
Martins Grid walk has always been one of my favorite things about the build up, so im glad we still have that. We dont get full use of all the SKY features of course...like driver cams and helmet cams n stuff... so we dont see it all, but my mate in the UK loves it ! lol... Im just happy to get the uploads of the race n qually ! ...so thanks again Footy !!
